name: Mine Towers
description:
This is a tower defense where you have to collect (mine) materials in order to craft turrets. You constantly have to go there and back between the mine and the battlefield. Be wise in your time consuming activities and never miss a second, those deadly spiders will come to raid your castle. 

PD: I used external resources to build the game witch are listed in the in game credits

Basic Controls:

  • WASD- Move player 
  • Mouse Click- Mine
  • I/O/P keyboard keys- place turrets 

Cheat: 

  • Press the green spider in the Tutorial Menu to unlock all levels

Planed Updates:

  • Experience/Money to upgrade player (mining speed, mining damage/ mining vision)
  • Tower upgrades (range-damage)
  • Better crafting 
  • Better UI
  • More maps
  • More monsters 
  • More towers
  • Own sprites
